title: France is fighting to save your iPhone from an early death
description: A few days ago I read articles saying that Apple is gaining significant market share because Apple phones are used longer, years longer, than Android phones. Now I'm reading that Apple makes their phones last shorter, by planning its obsolesence. I'm confused.

title: Hackers target 1.5M WordPress sites with cookie consent plugin exploit

title: Solar power due to overtake oil production investment for first time, IEA says
description: "We could both buy a Cadillac Escalade, you spending $60k and myself spending close to $90k that doesnt specifically mean I have better features. It could mean I am bad at negotiating costs." You're both bad. You bought a Cadillac!
